name: backbone-control
author: biril <alexlambiris@gmail.com>
description: Common UI elements, reinvented as data-driven Backbone components

scripts.testButton: lessc --verbose test/Button/style.less test/Button/style.css && (ws -f none & WSPID=$! ; bundle exec rspec -fd test/Button/test.rb ; EC=$? ; kill $WSPID ; exit $EC)
scripts.testSwitch: lessc --verbose test/Switch/style.less test/Switch/style.css && (ws -f none & WSPID=$! ; bundle exec rspec -fd test/Switch/test.rb ; EC=$? ; kill $WSPID ; exit $EC)
scripts.testTextField: lessc --verbose test/TextField/style.less test/TextField/style.css && (ws -f none & WSPID=$! ; bundle exec rspec -fd test/TextField/test.rb ; EC=$? ; kill $WSPID ; exit $EC)
scripts.test: npm run-script testPrepare && npm run-script testButton && npm run-script testSwitch && npm run-script testTextField
